1. The applicants who desire to join training under this scheme shall not be less than 10 years of age. Whereas any old age folk artist in the course of training could share their experience and guide the new generation with kind co-operation from Maand Guru.
> **Relaxation / Preference / Priority** Preference will be given to those Goan Maand culture which are on the verge of extinction.
